iti37:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
iti37:2.3: Saṁvejanīyesu ṭhānesu saṁvejanena, saṁviggassa ca yoniso padhānena.
iti37:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti.
iti37:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
